column4: Xfree86 is older then Xorg and sorta a project that is dieing to an extent
yeah, that's kinda what I thought..  I come in and out of linux, but I don't remember seeing XFree86 for a long time
think last update for Xfree86 was in 2006 March or so
gij is the default java installed in ubuntu I don't like it myself I use sun's version or my own depending what I feel like
